com.epimorphics.lda.sources
Class SourceBase

java.lang.Object
  com.epimorphics.lda.sources.SourceBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
CombinedSource, HereSource, LocalSource, SparqlSource, TDBSource
public abstract class SourceBase
extends Object

SourceBase provides the canonical implementation of the extended Source operations.

Author:
chris

Method Detail

execute

public abstract com.hp.hpl.jena.query.QueryExecution execute(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query query)
Each SourceBase subclass must provide execute.

getLock

public abstract com.hp.hpl.jena.shared.Lock getLock()
Each SourceBase subclass must provide a Lock on demand.

executeDescribe

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model executeDescribe(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query query)
query must be a DESCRIBE query. Answer the model which is the description.

executeConstruct

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model executeConstruct(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query query)
query must be a CONSTRUCT query. Answer the model which is constructed.

executeSelect

public void executeSelect(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query q,
                          Source.ResultSetConsumer c)
q must be a SELECT query. c.setup() is called on the QueryExecution object to do any setup (ie, LARQ index enabling). Then c.consume is supplied with the resultset from the select. When that returns, the execution object is closed.
